description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Energy Systems.

buildup.text: The phosphagen system fuels explosive 10-second bursts. Glycolysis powers efforts lasting 1 to 3 minutes.

discovery.text: Aerobic metabolism handles everything longer, burning carbs and fat with oxygen for sustained energy.

climax.text: Training each system needs different nutrition. Sprinters and marathon runners require different fuel.
